## Files For Today

Today's slides use data from Allison Horst's [`palmerpenguins`](https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/) data package (see also [Gorman KB, Williams TD, Fraser WR (2014)](https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0090081) ).

The files for today are provided zipped together [here](penguin_plotly_worksheet.tar). 

When unzipped you should have

- A dataset (penguins.csv)
- A worksheet (penguin_plotly_worksheet.ipynb)
- A set of solutions (penguin_plotly.ipynb)

If you can't open the zipped files, download these files, changing the extension of the worksheet and solutions from `.txt` to `.ipynb`.

- [penguins.csv](./penguins.csv)
- [penguin_plotly_worksheet.txt](./penguin_plotly_worksheet.txt)
- [penguin_plotly.txt](./penguin_plotly.txt)
